column4: hey guys. i just have a quick question. where can i get an install disk of ubuntu where i can specify the partition which i install to, is 64 bit, runs well with a geforce 8800 gtx, and a intel quad-core

I think you'll just want the 64 bit version of ubuntu for that.  The installer let's you do manual configuration of partitions and stuff so you'll be able to choose and such.  As for the geforce, you'll have to install nvidia driveers after the initial install to get full 3d power.
